characters: THE CRAZY RADIO HOST, CHARLIE FROST WAS RIGHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We listen to the immortal music of Mozart's Adagio of the Clarinet Concerto in A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space, infinite and empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then, slowly all nine planets of our Solar System mov into frame and align.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of them is the giant, burning sphere of the sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just as the sun enters frame, a solar storm of gigantic proportion unfolds. The eruptions shoot thousands of mile into the blackness of space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mozart's concerto filters from a jeep's stereo, fighting drumming sounds of the monsoon rain. PROF. FREDERIC WEST, listens to the music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Indian BOY playing by the roadside steers his wooden t ship across a puddle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Professor turns to his driver, pointing to the boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's too late. The jeep drives straight through the puddle at full speed, sinking the boy's toy ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, the jeep stops in front of a building. driver jumps out, leading the Professor towards its entra

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sign at the door reads: `Institute for Astrophysics - University of New Delhi'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An endless mine shaft. An old elevator cage comes to a grinding halt. When Prof. West steps out we see that he i accompanied now by a nervous DR. SATNAM TSURUTANI, 32.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How deep are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8200 feet. Used to be an old copper mine, Professor, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Prof. West follows Satnam, he takes in the unusual set for this science lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helmsley told me that the neutrino count doubled during the last sun eruptions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Correct, sir. But that is not what worries me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter a large room with low hanging ceilings. A smal group of WHITE COATS look up from their computers, which show images of the solar storm we witnessed earlier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was a new solar storm, so strong that the physical reaction got even more severe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can that be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't know, Professor, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam walks over into another room. There he opens a hat on the floor and hot steam rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The neutrinos suddenly act like... microwaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prof. West slowly steps closer. When he discovers that th water in the tank below is boiling, his face goes pale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A major fund raising party is under way. The setting is spectacular. A terrace overlooking the Washington Mall an the Capitol Building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADRIAN HELMSLEY, 32, stands with a group of young POLITIC AIDES. He is the only African-American among them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the aides spots CARL ANHEUSER, 58, White House Chi of Staff, working the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at Anheuser. Anyone would think he was President. Did you hear, he wants us to sign in and out like school boys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I still can't believe that Wilson chose him of all people to run the White House.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? Anheuser owns the Senate and the Congress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shame he's such a pompous ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody mention my name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian turns to see Anheuser smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes sir... No, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which one is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were talking about what a great speech you gave tonight. Well done, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Helmsley, right? I'll remember that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser walks away with a dangerous smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That guy scares the shit out of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At that moment Adrian's cell phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into the phone) Professor West?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been trying to reach you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prof. West is on the phone. In the background we make out Satnam's family around the dining room table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Adrian. The situation is much worse than we thought...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam quiets his little son. It is the boy we saw earlie with his toy ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian follows Anheuser through a hallway of the White Ho papers in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the President needs to know this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helmsley, how long have you been on the job as science advisor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four months this week.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would   say that's enough time to learn that we   have rules here. You'll just have to   wait until the quarterly science   briefing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this is about what I said last night, I am truly sorry, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you didn't like my speech?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exasperated, Adrian holds out the papers to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you please have a look at this, sir? It's really important.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, Anheuser rips the papers out of his hands and st to walk away, reading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly he slows down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who wrote this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Indian astrophysicist I graduated with from Harvard and Prof. West, the preeminent geologist in the US.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who else knows about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's keep it that way, Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: G8 Summit. Riot police control the unruly crowd with wate cannons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see PROTESTERS with Anti Globalization signs behind a fence. A convoy of limousines is approaching a historic building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow the American delegation into the conference roo where the other G8 delegations are seated around an enorm table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President of the United States, THOMAS F. WILSON, 56, doesn't sit down. He addresses the room and everybody goe quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good Morning...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time we see the President's face. He is Afr American.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hereby present a motion to meet privately with my seven fellow Heads of State, kindly excluding the rest of the delegates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A murmur erupts. The Russian President SERGEY MAKARENKO, whispers to one of his interpreters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Makarenko wishes to have his interpreters present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Wilson looks over to the Russian Colleague.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. President, judging from the conversations we've had in the past, I can assure you, your English is absolutely fine, for what I have to say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Russian President waves his interpreter away, all international delegates leave as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The huge doors of the hall close. A secret service office the sound booth switches off the recording equipment to t chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President gathers himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six months ago I was made aware of a situation so devastating, that at first, I refused to believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: However through the concerted efforts of the brightest scientists of several nations, we have now confirmed its validity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The world as we know it, will soon come to an end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge Chinese military helicopter blasts through a majes mountain valley in Tibet. We are at the top of the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Chinese COLONEL, wearing dark sun glasses, watches from chopper as the army forces the evacuation of the villages monasteries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) You will have new houses, electricity and running water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone speaks on a megaphone in the village square as villagers are evicted by soldiers and herded into trucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Some among you will even have the chance to work for the glorious People's Republic of China building the biggest dam project in the world...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NENG PANG, a young monk, 18, is loaded into a truck toget with his PARENTS, both in their 60's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng's older brother, LIN PANG, 25, is part of a huge cro of young men and women staying behind by a Tibetan school building. He turns and yells after the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will send you money mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Colonel with the dark glasses steps up, addressing th masses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who can read and write?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eager hands fly up in the air. An official makes notes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who can weld?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin's hand shoots up in the air. We hear a siren echoing through the mountains and suddenly an explosion. Lin turn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the BACKGROUND, a series of explosions punch enormous holes into the side of the mountain, showering rock everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MAN in a dark suit walks through a hallway of the Dorchester looking like your typical MI-6 agent. The deco plush and luxurious. He's stopped by two security men who frisk him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heavily ringed fingers flip through a folder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has his Highness had the opportunity to study the dossier?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SAUDI PRINCE looks up and nods without expression.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must understand I have a very big family. Mister...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isaacs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister Isaacs, one billion dollars is a lot of money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid the amount is in Euros, your Highness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of dark figures in overalls walk past famous Renaissance paintings. They stop at the Mona Lisa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MANFRED PICARD, 63, head of the French National Museums, stands by LAURA, a young African-American woman in her la 20's. They observe the specialists opening the case of th famous painting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A whoosh of air as the vacuum seal breaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura, I'm putting a lot of trust in your people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura answers in almost perfect French.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are too many crazy people who could hurt her, Manfred. The World Heritage Foundation has done this all over the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the BACKGROUND the Mona Lisa is taken off the wall and replaced with a perfect replica. Picard still looks uneas He watches as the real Mona Lisa is sealed into an airtig case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And she'll be safe now? Tucked away in the Swiss Alps?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfectly safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Picard looks suspicious but says nothing. The CAMERA MOVE on the face of the fake Mona Lisa until all we see is her mysterious smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lifeless bodies encircle a huge fire pit. They resemble t rays of the sun. In the background we see the famous step pyramids of Tikal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The mass suicide was discovered by a BBC documentary crew in the ancient Mayan city of Tikal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Many of the dead are women and children looking peaceful are surrounded by colorful flowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... the victims were said to have adhered to the Mayan-Quiche Calender which predicts the end of time to occur on the 21st of December this year, due to the sun's destructive forces...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA slowly pulls out and we are in--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shabby apartment in Silverlake. The TV is on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Strangely enough, scientific records do support the fact that we are heading for the biggest solar climax in recorded history...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small tremor rocks the apartment and the dishevelled fa of JACKSON CURTIS, 33, pops up from behind the couch. He asleep at his laptop last night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no. Not again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One look at his watch and he is off running. He throws so clothes and a toothbrush in a bag. His cell phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?... What do you mean? I'm not late. It's not even 10:30...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson turns off the TV and darts towards the door, stop only to slide his laptop into a knapsack. As he turns, he stumbles over a stack of books, all shrink-wrapped and identically titled: `Farewell Atlantis'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it! (into the phone) Kate, I'm on my way... For god's sake...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frustrated, he kicks them out of his way and exits. We ho on the books and realize that Jackson's photograph is on their back covers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone call continues as Jackson opens the garage door struggling to pack his old SUV with camping equipment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're kids, Kate, going on vacation. It's not a doctor's appointment... it's supposed to be fun. You remember that, right? Fun?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to start the engine, but the battery is dead. Frustrated, he hits the steering wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson runs across the street with his camping equipment throwing it into the trunk of a stretch limo parked by th curb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I know it's mosquito season at Yellowstone, Kate. I'll pick some up on the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He notices a deep crack in the asphalt. His neighbors, an elderly couple, stand there and stare at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merrill, we should move back to Wisconsin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson gets into the limo and speeds off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson drives through LA with the radio on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Those shake-proof coffee mugs are a genius idea, and they just show the true nature of us Californians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pass a family frantically loading boxes into a van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll not bow to little inconveniences like these so called `mini-quakes'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson passes a man in a wheelchair. He's holding up a cardboard sign: `Repent - The End is Near'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson stops and honks in front of an upscale Westwood h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... If you have a funny `mini-quake' story you wanna share, call Lisa & Randy at 1-800...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson switches the radio off. Two kids NOAH, 10, and LI 7, come running down the driveway. They slow down, as the see the limo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson, what is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't call me Jackson, Noah, I'm your father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly yells from inside the limo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah! Look! Daddy's got Space-Busters in the car... and Space-Busters 2. Awesome!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their mother, KATE CURTIS, 32, a beautiful woman appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what, you're a chauffeur now? What happened to the temp work?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is better hours for me. Means I can still write.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate's new boyfriend, GORDON SILBERMAN, 43, pulls out of garage in his Porsche wearing his Bluetooth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on the phone) Simone, how many times have I told you, we don't do Lipo on Fridays. It's too messy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson smiles bitterly. Gordon waves at the kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have fun guys. And watch out for those bears. (to Jackson) Nice car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson waves grudgingly as Gordon pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah needs to read twenty pages from his book each day...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She follows Jackson to the car with a bag of pull-up diap

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and Lilly has to put these on, before she goes to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shuts the trunk and gets back behind the wheel. She lo at him seriously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson, they've been really looking forward to this you know. Don't let them down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods as the car pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY HELMSLEY, 73, and his partner TONY DELGADO, 68, boa an enormous cruise ship, the `Freedom of the Seas'. Harry African-American, Tony is Italian. He carries a large cas They pass a poster: `Jazz Night with Harry Helmsley & Delgado'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So this time we'll hit the Japs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well Tony, electronics are cheap there and... you could visit your boy Will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afternoon ladies...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TONY shoots a charmers smile at a couple of older single ladies on sun loungers. They smile back coyly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you even listening to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes unfortunately I am Harry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard from Audrey you're a grandpa now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you keep your nose out of my family. You're cramping my style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He married a Japanese girl - how is that the end of the world? You should at least go see him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? Do you see your boy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not as much as I'd like. DC is a long way. But at least we talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Life, how short it is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly they're thrown off balance by a large swell that pulls the massive `Freedom of the Seas' away from the landing, about ten yards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The next moment, the ship slams back against the dock wit earthshaking BOOM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A murmur goes through the crowd. Luckily nobody is injure

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone rings twice before Laura switches on a light. W catch a glimpse of a framed photo of her and Adrian. She answers the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura? They lied to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manfred is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Picard is speeding in his Peugeot, anxiously checking his rear view mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had my suspicions. I should have said something. They are following me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They may be listening to us too. Laura the Heritage Foundation is a sham.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Picard's car approaches a tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The art you collected, it's not in the Alps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Peugeot enters a tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then where is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge blast rips through the tunnel as his car explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing along to the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `We all live in a Yellow Submarine...'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're driving through the glorious landscape of Yellows National Park. Noah sits in the back with headphones on playing Space-Busters 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they pass over a ridge, the music station is overpower by a talk show filtering through. We hear a raspy and excitable voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... After what is going on in La-La- land with all those surface cracks, I told myself: Get your stupid ass to Yellowstone. I don't want to miss all the great fun, when it finally blows...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly reaches for the dial of the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to the music?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on, sweet pea, let daddy listen to this for a moment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson corrects the dial to get better reception.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... There's been government people flying in and out all morning. And trust me, they did not look happy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge black helicopter brushes over the limo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Folks, always remember, you heard it first from Charlie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They watch in awe as the chopper disappears behind a ridg

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura bursts in and heads straight for the TV. The Presid looks up from his desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to see this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sally the President's Secretary enters, flustered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's alright Sally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sally closes the door as Laura turns up the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Mr. Picard had been the director of the French National Museums for 24 years. As fate would have it his assassination took place in the same Paris tunnel where Princess Diana died in 1997.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President comes around his desk. Laura looks at him distraught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just talked to him, Dad. He told me the world Heritage Foundation is a sham. Is that true?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President shoots an anxious look across the room. Lau turns and suddenly realizes that Adrian is standing in th corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You knew too? You sleep with me and you didn't say anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian looks ashamed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't even look at you. Either of you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honey, calm down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man was killed! I want the truth Dad. Right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dense forest trail. We hear Lilly before we see her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy, where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To a very special place, Lil'bee. It's a lake. A place where mommy and daddy fell in love. (winking to Noah) Remember the book I gave you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to know where you and mom had sex. I'm not ready for that, Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm your dad, Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson runs to catch up with Lilly who has reached a fen with a `keep out' sign posted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This wasn't here before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson starts to climb the fence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you see the signs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his kids crest a ridge. They look down on a parched basin with cracked terrain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gone. The whole darn lake is gone. I swear you guys there was a lake here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids roll their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A puddle of water is all that remains of the lake. Jackso and the kids walk into the basin, unaware of being watche THROUGH BINOCULARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson spots an electronic measuring device and crouches have a closer look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elsewhere in the lake bed, we see sand seeping through CR in the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he looks up, he sees heavily armed soldiers coming towards them from all sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay, Noh'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the BINOCULARS, we see Jackson and his kids arres and led over a ridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With this we reveal an ENORMOUS RESEARCH FACILITY with hundreds of tents and vehicles surrounding a massive dril tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian Helmsley and Prof. West exit the drilling tower, b studying papers. Adrian notices Jackson and his kids near being interrogated by an OFFICER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be with you in a second, Professor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian walks towards them. Jackson stares at the officer defiance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... And then you climbed over a posted fence? Just like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isn't this supposed to be a National Park? There shouldn't be fences. What are you guys doing around here anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're geologists...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson turns and sees Adrian standing there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll handle this officer. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The officer reluctantly hands him Jackson's license.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, where did the lake go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what we're trying to find out. We think this whole area has become potentially unstable. I would advise you to take your kids and leave, Mr...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws a look at Jackson's drivers license.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Curtis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up at Jackson with renewed interest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you by any chance the Jackson Curtis, the author of `Farewell Atlantis'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, that's me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson straightens up proudly. Lilly smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a coincidence. I'm reading your book, as we speak... first third, around day 300, when the shuttle loses communication with earth and drifts off into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're one of lucky 422 who bought it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually I didn't buy it. My father gave it to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prof. West waves at Adrian from one of the container labs Adrian hands back Jackson his drivers license.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Officer, can you return them to the campgrounds, please. (to Jackson) Pleasure to meet you, Mr. Curtis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his kids look after Adrian hurrying away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was very nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes he was, Lil'bee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and the kids walk back to the campgrounds when suddenly CHARLIE FROST, 62, a crazy looking guy with binoculars around his neck, stands in their way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did the government guys tell you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks at him, instinctively picking up Lilly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They think it's not such a good idea to climb over their fences. They feel the area is unstable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie bursts out laughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unstable! Ha-ha! They say its unstable! That's funny...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With this he turns around and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson is sitting on a camp chair, right outside the ten He's on his laptop, looking enquiringly at an aerial pict of Yellowstone on Google earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background we see the kids are in the tent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are mosquitos in here. Did anybody spray the tent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks up, remembering he forgot the spray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll get some of that tomorrow. For tonight just put your head under the blankie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy you said you weren't gonna work on your book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not Honey, I promise. Are you wearing your pull-ups?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly nods as Jackson walks over and tucks her into bed. kisses her good night. He turns and is surprised to see N typing a text on his cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did mommy buy you that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... Gordon gave it to me for my birthday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson takes the phone from out of Noah's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah. Things like a cell phone have to be discussed in the family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What family?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson reads the message Noah has typed `Hey Gordon, Cam Sucks!'. Hurt, Jackson hands back the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to sleep guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commotion. The base packs up. Adrian and Prof. West duck as they board a chopper. Adrian is on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You have to immediately inform the President, Mr Anheuser. The readings look much worse than I expected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plus Satnam's neutrino figures from India confirm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear Anheuser, yelling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... But you guys said...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were wrong! By five or six months...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second later the chopper lifts off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson has his laptop open with the cursor blinking away the words `Chapter Seven'. But he can't concentrate on writing after what Noah has said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A chopper flies overhead. Jackson follows it's path over campsite and his eyes fall on an American flag fluttering top of a massive radio antennae. This belongs to an RV tr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the RV's window, Jackson sees the silhouette of Charlie Frost, the guy with the binoculars, speaking into microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curious, Jackson flicks on the radio and twists the dial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Charlie's voice) ... We have a listener calling in. Bill from Cooke City, you're on the Charlie Frost Show. (Bill's voice) I wanted to know, where will this all start?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson is intrigued. He puts his laptop down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Charlie's voice) Well, something like this could only originate in Hollywood, Ha-Ha! But seriously, they've got the earth cracking under their asses already, Bill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson climbs out of his car and starts towards the RV. can still hear the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Bill's voice) Our family believes in the gospel of our Lord Jesus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have nothing to fear, Charlie. (Charlie's voice) Good for you Bill, good for you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie hits a switch. Music starts playing. The Doors, ` End'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... This is Charlie Frost reporting live from Yellowstone National Park, soon to become the world's largest active volcano.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie is about to take a bite of his sandwich, when the a knock on the door. Jackson sticks his head in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi. Mind if I join you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only got a few minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie bites into his sandwich as Jackson looks around a all the equipment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just heard part of your broadcast... Mind me asking a question? What exactly is it... that will start in Hollywood?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually it's gonna be the whole west coast...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The apocalypse, the end of days. The Mayans knew it, the I Ching and the Bible, kind of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got to eat... Just check my blog. You can download it for free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie clicks on his laptop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... However, we do take donations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crudely animated film starts to play. Charlie narrates screen in an overly dramatic fashion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the year 2012 a cataclysmic event will unfold. Caused by an alignment of the planets in our solar system that only happens every 640,000 years... Just imagine the earth as an Orange...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie appears as an animated figure holding an orange.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... our sun will begin to emit such extreme amounts of radiation, that the core of the earth will melt - that's the inside part of the Orange, leaving the crust of our planet free to shift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On screen the middle of the orange shrinks, now the skin moves freely around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In 1958, Prof. Hapgood named it `Earth Crust Displacement'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A faded portrait of a scientist appears on screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and Albert Einstein endorsed it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The infamous photo of Einstein, sticking out his tongue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The forces of mother nature will be so devastating it will bring an end to this world on winter solstice 12-21-12.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The film ends with an image of the whole earth covered wi water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie shuts the laptop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty neat, huh? It's a big hit on YouTube. I did the animation myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what you're thinking. But all the governments know about this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they all knew, don't you think somebody would tell us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They can't. Just think about it. First the stockmarket would crash...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie opens a can of beer. Phsssh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the economy... boom. The dollar... boom. And then the people in the streets... (mimicking gun fire) Boom, boom! Pandemonium, revolution, war! They would never tell us. Beer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson shakes his head still struggling to digest this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only if you're some Sheik, Bill Gates, or maybe one of those Russian billionaires do you stand a chance to buy a seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A seat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're building spaceships, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No really... One of my listeners, a geography professor at UTSC, has even figured out where they're building them. He sent me a map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... Charlie, I think I gotta go. My kids are sleeping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie looks at him bug eyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get them out of Yellowstone, man. It's gonna get ugly here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night, Charlie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jackson exits, Charlie gets back on the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry for the delay, folks. But even in times like these, a man has got to eat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Westwood. The parking lot of Gelson's is nearly empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eerie silence. Suddenly some of the cars begin to shift i place from an unseen force. A small CRACK creases the asp and slowly crawls towards the brightly lit supermarket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Muzak is playing. Kate and her boyfriend Gordon are shopp late. She picks up some pull-ups for Lilly, Gordon steps behind her, wrapping his arms around her waist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we make a baby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches up and touches her breasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it! We're in public.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon lets go of her with mock disappointment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honey, I created them. And now suddenly I can't touch them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate pushes him away and moves on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few customers are paying at the checkout stand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHIND THEM: Huge glass windows reveal cars slowly slidin into the ever widening crack in the parking lot. Nobody inside notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon catches up with Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You always act strange after he shows up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just because I don't care for your arrogant humor doesn't mean I'm acting strange. He is the father of my kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe biologically. Can I remind you what that guy did? First you gave up med school to have Noah... Then you practically raise him and Lilly by yourself while he sat glued to a laptop writing that junk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some of his stuff is actually... He's published Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, published! You know your mother was right. You've always been drawn to guys with lofty dreams and empty pockets. But not this time right, sweetheart?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate smiles awkwardly and picks up a can of soup. The she in front of her shakes for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you see that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate slowly puts the cans of soup into her cart and looks around. Gordon senses a problem between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know Kate, we have to keep working at this... our relationship. Because I won't end up being just a re-run of you and Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean Honey, I feel like... something is pulling us apart?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Gordon finishes his sentence--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A violent ROAR! From front to back, the entire supermarke rips open right between Kate and Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The few customers scream in horror at the sight of the hu crevasse forming beneath them. Kate and Gordon are thrown against opposite aisles holding on for dear life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They cling to the columns as the shelves fold into the ev widening crack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson puts down some groceries at the checkout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stop scratching. You'll get them infected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He smiles at the female cashier behind the counter who do not look friendly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something for Mosquito bites please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before or after?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman looks at Lilly and Noah with their red lumps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd get before and after.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She slams two mosquito products on the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! Mrs. Birnbaum, my teacher is on TV!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the store's TV: A heavy-set blonde WOMAN, 45, speaking a reporter in front of Gelson's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's our supermarket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gap in the ground is enormous now, at least half a mi long and 200 feet wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids, we have to pack up and go find mommy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Wilson and Anheuser walk towards the Situation Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, you have to initiate the boarding process immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this even possible? What's our information from China?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They estimate four of the ships will be ready for launch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President is shocked by this news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only four?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's alright with you sir, I'll brief the panel about the new development.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd rather have Adrian do that. They trust him. I told him to be in on the meeting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser fumes as they enter the situation room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flat screens line the walls. A video conference is under with each of the G8 members represented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and Gentlemen, we all knew this day would come. But we never imagined it would come this soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over to Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would like to pass this over to my science advisor, Adrian Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian steps up and gathers himself. Anheuser watches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make this brief...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pointing to a set of charts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... According to our latest data from Yellowstone, the temperature of the subterranean crust of the earth, the cement that holds our landmass in place, is increasing at a rapid rate, much faster than anticipated...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the heads of state are glued to his words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... This causes extreme polar instability. The magnetic fields have decreased by more than 80% over the last 48 hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The German Chancellor, a woman, interrupts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much time do we have, Mr. Helmsley?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian glances to Professor West, standing in the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two, maybe three days if we're lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Prime Minister of Italy breaks in, upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can you speak about luck in such a situation?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apologies Prime minster. He's still new to the job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Wilson steps up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nevertheless, Mr. Antonioni, we have to make an immediate decision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear CHEERING and APPLAUSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Introducing the 320 pound muscle machine from the Ukraine...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The arena is filled to its max. The crowd is on its feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and tonight's challenger for the heavy weight world championship of the world. Here he is... Mister Zultan Balashin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd ROARS as the boxer and his entourage enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA moves in on a tall man with blonde clean cut h He is well built, wearing designer clothing from head to YURI KARPOV, 45, stereotypical Russian oligarch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He approaches the ringside corner and whistles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zultan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The nervous boxer turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Ah, finally, Yuri. I thought I would not see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri hits the boxer's gloves. Zultan is nervous. His coac steps in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He needs to concentrate now, Mister Karpov.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shut up... when I talk to my boy, understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Mr. Karpov.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good... That is good. (in Russian to the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zultan my friend. Do not forget. We are fighters. We never go down. We always stay on our feet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zultan just keeps nodding, pumping himself up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... No matter who is hitting us. No matter how hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GONG. First Round. The fight is on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, go kill the bastard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri walks to his seat, sitting down next to his trophy:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TAMARA, 28, blonde, wears the shortest mini one can imagi designer shoes, handbag, glasses and boobs. In her lap sh holds CAESAR, a tiny dog wearing a diamond collar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the ring the boxers maul at each other. Yuri's cell ph beeps. It's a text message:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri's whole demeanor changes. Without a word, he gets up walks out of the arena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri bear... where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri does not respond as he squeezes through the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zultan, the boxer, notices Yuri leave. In that split seco distraction, he is hit HARD and goes down for the count.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd ROARS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson has driven all night. The sun rises, a giant glow orb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Caltech believes that the incident in the Westwood supermarket has released most of the surface tension...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson pulls up. The kids are asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... It looks like life in the city will soon be back to normal, Mayor Gonzales said at an early morning news conference from his home in Hancock Park.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson switches off the radio and wakes his kids gently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly, we're home sweetie. (to Noah) Wake up big man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate heads to the car. Still sleepy, the kids grab their stuff and run into her arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh honey, I'm so glad you're back... And you too, darling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We tried calling but -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hungry Mummy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least it looks like the Mosquitos ate well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at Jackson and softens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanna come in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon appears at the door. Jackson watches painfully as runs and gives Gordon a big hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His cellphone beeps with a message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you Curtis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri stands at a huge window overlooking the strip talkin into his phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in Westwood, Mister Karpov.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. That is good. I'm sending the Gulfstream to pick up Alec and Oleg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara hovers in the background packing her Louis Vuitton luggage. Caesar, her little dog, watches from the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Tell him to bring Caesar's raincoat, it's in the Range Rover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri brushes her off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While talking to Yuri, Jackson is standing in front of th open trunk, changing into his chauffeur suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curtis, make sure you get my boys as fast you can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A palatial home. Completely gaudy. The twins, ALEC and OL wait impatiently. They are 12 years old and wear identica clothing by Dior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curtis, you are late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson ignores him and starts throwing the luggage into limo. The other twin notices his muddy sneakers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful with our stuff. Don't get it dirty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahead of the limo a crowd has formed in the streets, sing songs and chanting about the end of days. A SKINNY MAN wi ponytail preaches from the scriptures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... There will be famines, pestilences and earthquakes, sayeth the Lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson has to maneuver through the people. Banners read: `Prepare for the End'-- 'You cannot escape his judgement'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alec looks up from his video game, annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curtis, can't you go faster?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you guys blind? I can't run people over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? They're idiots anyway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson shoots these spoilt brats an angry look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson stops in front of the Gulfstream. SASHA, 40, Yuri Russian pilot is expecting them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Jackson. Took you a while...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson mutters under his breath as he unloads the luggag dropping one of them on Alec's foot on purpose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ouch! Be more careful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other twin has noticed Jackson's intensions. He gets his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're laughing, Curtis. But we are going on a big ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will live... and you will die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oleg grins back at Jackson as the jet door closes. The Gulfstream taxis onto the runway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jackson turns back to the car a fine surface crack sho across the tarmac. We hold on his face as it hits him lik ton of bricks:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frantically Jackson looks around and spots a MAN in overa working on a twin engine Cessna. He runs to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where can I rent a plane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man points to a shabby office building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate is in her kitchen cooking breakfast for the kids. Go watches the Governor on the news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with Austrian

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... just this morning my people at Caltech told me that in the last 36 hours we had basically zero earthquake activity in Southern California, which is very rare...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone rings. Kate picks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson drives like crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Kate, we have to get out of LA! I've rented a plane for us. Get the kids ready! I'll be there in five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids have plans today...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you kidding me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No I'm not! Noah has music at 2 and Lil' has Karate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon rolls his eyes and mutters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not that we'd expect him to remember.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: California is going down! Pack up the kids!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're crazy! The Governor just said we're fine now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Governor's a meathead, how would he know anything? Kate listen! You gotta trust me over some politician. Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate slams the phone down. Lilly stops eating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mommy, why are you so angry with Daddy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because your daddy is a lunatic, darling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the TV, the interview comes to an end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... it looks to me, like the worst is over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That moment a MASSIVE QUAKE hits Los Angeles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody dives under the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TV: The news casters and the Governor do the same. A f seconds later the signal cuts out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon pulls Kate and the kids close as the earth shakes violently for 20 seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson flies into the driveway and runs into the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he enters, Lilly immediately runs into his arms. The next tremor hits. Cracks form on the kitchen floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to leave! Noah, let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're safer here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah, now! Kate please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole house rides up and down like on a wave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think he's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally Kate pushes her son out from under the table. The all scramble out of the house in a panic. Kate is cut on shoulder by falling glass but she hardly notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they storm out of their front door the house crumbles behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in the car!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole street starts to buckle. Left and right the hou are shaken and smashed like toys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just before the wave of destruction can reach them, Jacks tears out of the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson maneuver's the limo through the crumbling neighborhood. Right in front of their eyes, streets disappear, trees fall, electrical lines snap. Sewer pipes burst in front of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson has to turn on the windshield wipers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The limo crashes through a gate onto the tarmac, coming t stop in front of a twin engine Cessna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it! Where's the pilot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate turns to Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, you know how to fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... had a couple lessons...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you cover taking off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good enough for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start running, when Jackson remembers something and heads back to the Limo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs his knapsack from the front seat fumbling to zip laptop back inside it. Kate shouts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson, what are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He jumps out of the car and races back after them. Behind Jackson the hangar starts to disintegrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A gigantic fissure forms in the earth, shooting towards S Monica airport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon fumbles with the controls, Jackson yells from the copilot seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing at the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'm supposed to check all these first...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson reaches over and slams Gordon's hand down and the plane lurches forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Cessna speeds onto the tarmac the control tower go down and explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah discovers the giant crevasse forming behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, behind us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the plane accelerates, the giant crack closes in on th Gordon's hand trembles on the throttle control. Everybody screams on top of each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon! Damn it! Lift off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon gathers his courage and pulls the lever. The plane almost rockets into the air just as the ground beneath th gives way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hover for a moment, almost caught in mid-air as the widening crevasse beneath them fights to suck them into t bowels of the earth. Gordon fights to maintain control bu they begin to be pulled down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The daylight vanishes. Debris and mud smashes into the pl from all sides. The canyon walls erupt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't get it up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taking desperate measures, Gordon nearly rips the control stick out of its joint - with a lurch the Cessna lifts ou the abyss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all take a deep breath only to realize that now they flying directly into the collapsing towers of downtown Lo Angeles!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like a roller coaster, Gordon manages to weave the little plane through the tumbling high rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They dive one last time to evade the plummeting US BANK TOWER, the tallest building on the west coast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All are dead silent as they watch the whole of Los Angele crumble beneath them. Kate covers Lilly's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in total shock) That was amazing, Gordon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks at Kate and notices her cut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (brushing it off) I'm fine. How did you know this was gonna happen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't. (To Gordon) Do we have enough fuel to make it to Yellowstone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane veers off in a northeasterly direction. Behind the destruction of Los Angeles continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gigantic cruise ship plows through the Pacific. We he lounge music...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian's father Harry and his partner Tony are on stage. Harry on the piano, singing, Tony playing the bass. A wai brings drinks. Water for Harry, and a brightly colored cocktail for Tony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got fans Tony...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony raises his glass to two old ladies who are sitting a the bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a call for you Harry. Want me to take a message?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (while still playing) I'll be right there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The waiter nods. A few more bars of music, then applause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into the microphone) Thank you ladies and gentlemen. Let's hear it for the one and only Tony Delgado... And I'm Harry Helmsley and we'll be back after a short pit stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Applause. Harry rushes off stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad... what I have to tell you is very serious...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian is standing in a dark corner. Behind him people ar packing up, carrying boxes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You remember when I told you about the dam in China? Well, it's happening much sooner than we anticipated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry's face has turned serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President has ordered us to clear out the White House.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hah... About time someone cleaned up that mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian fights back the tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you, dad? What exactly is the course of the `Freedom' right now?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all good, Adrian. Don't worry about your old man. You have more important things to do now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a tremor in Harry's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, your mom and I, we had a hell of a great life... and a hell of a great kid too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the `Freedom' is a pretty big ship you know... Don't write your old man off, just yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tear runs down Adrian's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Besides, I could never leave Tony alone. You know how he can't keep decent time by himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you, dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry bites his lip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love you too, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the lounge, Tony has finished his cocktail. Harry walks up and hollers at the barkeeper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Herb. Get me a double Jack on the rocks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After twenty-five years on the wagon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? Who cares how long we do certain things? How long we drink booze, how long we talk to people... Or how long we don't talk to people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry grabs Tony by his shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woah!... Harry, what's the matter with you? Let's go. We're back on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry pulls him even closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call your kid, you stubborn old ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going back on that stage unless you promise to call him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony, the ladies are waiting for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promise me, Tony... please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry stares him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, maybe I should call him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry smiles, downs his bourbon and walks back on stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian enters his office. The TV is on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... There is little we know at this point, but the earthquake registered at 10.1 on the Richter scale. The whole of the Western seaboard was hit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Assistants stare at the news in shocked disbelief, some o them are crying. Prof. West appears at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing at the TV) Have you seen this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prof. West silently nods and beckons Adrian, who follows down the hall into a dark control room. They look at a wa sized high def monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have satellite images. Here's the sequence we've got so far.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the monitors, detailed satellite imagery displays how monstrous quake unfolds, leaving California sliding into sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any news from Yellowstone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anytime now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The base is abandoned but for a few structures and the enormous drilling tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon manages to land the plane next to what looks like fueling station. Jackson leaps out checking the pump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, there's fuel! Fill her up and I'll look for Charlie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure about this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate, everything this guy said so far has happened. I'll be right back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson runs off towards the hills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy wait! I wanna come with you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly runs after him. Jackson picks her up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly! Come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine! I'll take her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate watches as they disappear, worried. Noah and Gordon started to fuel the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and Lilly find Charlie's RV with it's door hangin open. They enter. The key is in the ignition. The radio transmitters are on, but Charlie is gone. Jackson fiddles with the switches and Charlie's voice comes on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I am standing here at the highest point on what is the rim of this super volcano...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got to be close by, Lil'bee...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson jumps behind the wheel and turns the ignition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go back, Daddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me. We have to find Charlie. He's got a secret map, you know, like Jack Sparrow in `Pirates'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That catches her interest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lil', we have to work as a team now, okay? You have to help me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson passes her his mobile phone. Lilly nods. He throw the RV into gear and they speed off over the bumpy terrai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In their dust, we see the earth fissuring!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson drives like a bat out of hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The last time this baby blew, was 640,000 years ago...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dial Mommy's number, sweetheart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson tears up the mountain looking for Charlie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate's phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi mommy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you, honey!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson hears the stress in Kate's voice. He hisses at Li

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell her we'll be back in ten minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking for a secret map, mommy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson grimaces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate tries to keep it together for Lilly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me speak to your daddy, darling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy can't talk right now, he's driving really fast...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RV runs over a boulder. Lilly hits the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ouch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LILLY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background Kate hears the voice of Charlie Frost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I tell you guys, any minute now... any minute the fireworks will start...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's in the car with you? Who's that man screaming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not in the car. He's on a mountain waiting for fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly spots Charlie way up on a ridge. He has erected his foot radio antenna with the flag fluttering on top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jackson) There he is! Up there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the best, darling. Give Daddy the phone... (into the phone) Kate I am sorry, I can't talk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The road ends just below the mountain peak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring back my child, Jackson! NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson sees Charlie up above, broadcasting. He hangs up phone and jumps out of the RV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wait here for me! You watch the ship while Captain Curtis talks to the pirate. Okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson climbs up to Charlie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie has his broadcasting equipment strapped to his bo The antenna's flag is whipping in the wind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into his mic) ... I wish you guys at home could see this on TV...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He notices Jackson and muffles the microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you make it up here? Thought you were toast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spaceships Charlie, where are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't make it there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a plane. We can get you out of here too. Let's go Charlie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All around the landscape begins to collapse. A three mile crater forms, revealing the awe-inspiring sight of the su volcano.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll never make it out in time. Just stay and enjoy the big bang. That your kid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson discovers Lilly standing behind him, staring at Charlie with her big brown eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson grabs Charlie lifting him off the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is that god damn map!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy, easy. Watch the mic... I don't know. Somewhere in my camper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A low rumble builds to a rapturous thunder as MILLIONS OF BIRDS tear into flight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Look at that!... (into his mic) Fly birdies fly! This marks the last day of the United States of America folks and by tomorrow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mouth of the volcano starts to break apart revealing molten lava underneath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... the last of mankind. Soon they'll see us from a million miles away, out there in the milky way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson grabs his wide eyed daughter and races down the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and Lilly jump into the RV and races off, with Charlie's broadcast still playing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The ash cloud will travel everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First the lights will go out in Vegas, then Dallas, St. Louis and then Washington DC...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson's cell phone rings and he picks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're on our way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson, things are really looking bad here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In that instant, the air around them vanishes, as if suck from the landscape into a vacuum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE BIGGEST EXPLOSION THE WORLD HAS EVER SEEN... At least the last 640,000 years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To them, all this occurs in total silence. The sound of t eruption has not reached them yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are frozen, unable to comprehend what is happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The explosion begins to resembles an atomic mushroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... it's beautiful, kids! Just beautiful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound waves reach Charlie, throwing him to the ground

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RV flies over the rugged terrain. Everywhere the eart cracking, falling apart. Jackson struggles to swerve arou the disappearing landscape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's following us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly has discovered the expanding ASH CLOUD behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just don't look back, Lil'bee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The THUNDERING sound envelopes them! On the radio, the vo of Charlie is getting shrill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Majestic!... Oh yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charlie slowly tries to stand again, silhouetted against cloud of dust and fire towering above him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flaming rocks fly towards him. When they hit the ground, detonate like fire bombs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh baby! It's coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocks plummet like comets around the RV as Jackson races a collapsing bridge. On the radio, in his delirious state Charlie begins to sing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `This is the end, my friend'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yellowstone looks like a war zone. The RV dodges the bombardment of fire and rock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huge tree trunks and glowing boulders fly at Charlie thro the ashes. He screams at the top of his lungs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Folks, always remember, you heard it first from Charlie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
