dialogues.text: A second later, Charlie's radio antenna comes spinning li scythe through the air. It decapitates Charlie in an inst

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The radio cuts out. The forest and the camp grounds are m flat by the extreme force of the ASH CLOUD. In the rear v mirror Jackson sees it gaining on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LILLY! DOWN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A firebomb hits the RV, ripping half the roof off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly barely makes it under the dashboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay down there, Lil'! We're almost there! Just keep looking at daddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson spots the little Cessna in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the entrance to the airstrip a huge crevasse forms, cutting the RV off from reaching the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly sticks out her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mommy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson swerves wildly to miss the crack, sending Lilly flying out. Without thinking, he lets go of the wheel, lunging after her and pulling her back inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay down darling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson races the RV alongside the forming crack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spotting a narrow point in the crevasse, he makes a decis Slamming the accelerator down, he races towards it at ful speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moments later the RV is airborne!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate watches, too shocked to scream. A few drawn out seco

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the RV touches down, crashing 200 feet from the plan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate runs towards the wreckage of the camper. Lilly jumps out, racing into her mom's arms. Jackson turns and sees t cloud approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys go! I'll be right there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate pulls Lilly back to the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson jumps into the back of the RV scavenging through shelves, looking for Charlie's map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate lifts Lilly onto the wing of the plane. Gordon revs the engines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me your hand, Lil'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah pulls his little sister into the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiery rocks rain from the sky, detonating to the right an left of their plane as Kate climbs in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to take off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's daddy?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate, I'm sorry but if we wait we'll all die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon pushes the throttle. The plane starts to move. Kat screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon! Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the RV, Jackson is frantically going through the masses of books and papers on the shelves. Finally, a map unfolds it. But it's only of the London underground syste

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws it to the ground and finds another. This time h lucky! There are markings everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he races to the door, the ground gives way beneath the Kate and the kids watch it disappear from sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACKSON! NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah begins to cry and Lilly clings to her mom. Gordon ju stares, paralyzed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ASH CLOUD is almost upon them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon takes action and accelerates the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate turns back. A hand emerges from the crevasse. Then another, holding a map. Her face lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's daddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson pulls himself up and sprints towards them, the ma his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson! Here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate leans out of the cockpit reaching for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Faster Dad. You can make it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate, grab him for god sake. We're almost out of runway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using every last ounce of energy, Jackson leaps onto the and is yanked into the plane by Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just at that moment, the plane lifts off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson falls into the cockpit, completely out of breath. Lilly crawls over and hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for waiting guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now all eyes are glued to the speedometer. 180... 190...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The violent ASH CLOUD is hitting their tail rudder. The p swerves wildly! Gordon gets it back under control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The speedometer finally creeps towards 200 mph and the CL slowly falls back. Everybody breathes a sigh of relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, now that you got your map, where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson unfolds it and takes a look. Hundreds of markings clutter the map. In the left corner he discovers a large letter C followed by H - I - N - A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna need a bigger plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The White House is being evacuated. Amidst the chaos stan Anheuser. Adrian puts down a phone and looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a few minutes ago Yellowstone erupted, sir. The ash cloud will reach Washington in roughly 7 hours. Maybe 6. We have strong easterly winds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the crustal displacement?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one knows, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser starts walking, Adrian trails behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get the government airborne and... I mean now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser and Adrian burst into the Anteroom of the Oval Office. The President's secretary, SALLY, 55, is packing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is the President, Sally?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sally looks up stone faced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He said he wanted to spend a few minutes alone. I think he's over at the chapel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole North American continent is about to perish, and Wilson decides to go to church!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian shoots an angry look at Anheuser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's praying sir. Which considering the circumstances is not a bad idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe. But right now I need the leader of the free world off his knees and on Air Force One. Wheels up 1900 hours. Can I leave that with you Helmsley?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser walks away. Adrian and Sally exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I really don't like that man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian finds the President standing near the front of the chapel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. President? We need to get you out of Washington immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Wilson stays with his head bowed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now matter how idealistic you are taking office. You lose your innocence behind that desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura was right. People have died because of the decisions I made.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not your fault sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to face Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sound like Anheuser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This quietly affects Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura's never looked at me like that before. Only once... When I told her, her mother had died. You knew the first lady?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what she said to me that night we brought her to the hospital?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Tommy... I think you should do a lottery. Every one should have a chance to go'. That's what Dorothy said to me. That's what we should have done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There would have been chaos, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Wilson looks Adrian in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what I believe, Adrian. I believe nature should choose for itself, from itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian takes this in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let her go. You'll regret it if you do. Prove to Laura what kind of a man you are. And I'll do the same... You go now. And watch your back for Anheuser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian stares at the President in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go. That's an order Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tense moment before Adrian starts to walk away. Just as exits the chapel, Wilson calls after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you tell my daughter... there's nothing on earth that I cherish more than her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hold on President Wilson's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most of Las Vegas is destroyed. A 200 foot wide canyon no divides sin city along its famous strip. The towering cas still teeter along the canyon's rim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All forms of emergency rescue operations are deployed aro the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the FOREGROUND, we see Las Vegas International Airport its runway cut dramatically short. Large pieces of tarmac continue to break off into the crevasse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon maneuvers his plane through the chaos. Airplanes a strewn about the runway. Passengers everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you we should have gone to my parents' in the Rockies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon's right. Look at this mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks around frantically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand, it's our only chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't one of your crazy stories now. How the hell are we gonna make it to China?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, without Jackson, we'd never have made it out of California.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. Noah is right and they know it. They taxi past a private jet whose front wheel is stuck in a hole in the tarmac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a dog barking and the CAMERA finds Tamara, with Caesar in her arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful with the landing gear! (in Russian) Tamara, get the boys out of the way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An airport tow truck attempts to pull Yuri's Gulfstream j out. Sasha, the pilot, helps. A safety announcement echoe through the whole area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over loudspeaker) Attention! The US National Guard has informed us, that an extremely hazardous ash cloud is headed towards the city of Las Vegas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara looks scared and secretly reaches for Sasha's hand They share an intimate look, no one else sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We strongly advise every one to move indoors immediately...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tow truck driver panics and runs inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We move in on Yuri. For the first time he looks helpless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, Jackson and his family join the panick crowd heading towards the terminal building. Firemen and rescue workers usher them forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's move people! Inside the terminal!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his family are swept along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian rushes up the stairs of Air Force One, approaching of the flight officers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Anheuser?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the command center, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian moves on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian enters. Anheuser immediately senses something is amiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President is not coming. I couldn't convince him to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone in the room looks up, speechless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, the captain doesn't want to leave his sinking ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Mr. Helmsley, we just learned that the Vice President's chopper crashed 80 miles north of Atlanta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian is shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the Speaker of the House?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In this chaos... I have no idea!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But she's Commander In Chief now. Sir, I just think -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser moves in dangerously close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care what you think, Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura quietly enters the Command Center, as Anheuser and Adrian stare each other down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your ass only made it into the White House, because your old man knew the First Lady... and because of all that affirmative action bullshit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser takes it even further.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was a white kid, much more qualified than you. Just so you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian's face is ashen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is my father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone turns to Laura. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wanted to stay with his people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the engines of Air Force One turn over. Laura panics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to go back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian tries to hold her close to him. Anheuser sees this intimate moment and gives a suspicious, questioning look. second later Laura pushes Adrian away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me get out. Mr. Anheuser - tell the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a protocol for just this situation Ms. Wilson and I'm afraid we'll have to follow it to the letter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser turns to an officer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell the Captain, to take off immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks at him incredulously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emergency lights illuminate the densely populated termina

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People, stay away from the windows!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the rescue workers yells, pushing Jackson and his family back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frustrated, Jackson turns to Kate and Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't get stuck here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a voice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Silberman? What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all turn and stare at Tamara, holding her little dog against her plump breasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate gives Gordon a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's a patient, honey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But when Jackson discovers Yuri behind her, his tone sudd changes. He gets in Yuri's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bastard. You knew it all along! (at the twins) You and those spoiled rotten sons of yours...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha comes running in and cuts through this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I found us a plane, an Antonov. They were just about to take off, but the tower didn't let them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you still fly that thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure... But I need a copilot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly chimes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon is a pilot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Gordon can protest Jackson picks up Lilly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They burst through the emergency exit, setting off an ala Emergency personnel yell after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Stop! You can't go out there! Come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they keep on running. Sasha now leads the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They race around the corner and come to a halt. Before th a Russian freight plane of enormous size--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ANTONOV 225, the biggest aircraft in the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, that is a big plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Russian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha, who has run ahead turns back and sees:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MASSIVE GREY WALL OF ASH moving towards the airport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all run after him up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha enters the cockpit and puts on the headset while readying the plane for takeoff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into the mic) You'll find folding seats on each side of the cargo hold...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Sit down and buckle up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all scramble to get into their seats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Look at those!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They discover the cargo they are carrying--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sports cars, SUV's, concept cars and luxury models, some them are labeled `Las Vegas Auto Show 2012'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We had VIP tickets for that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The six engines of the Antonov come roaring to life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane is starting to move. Gordon sits uncomfortably the copilot's seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You check the main bus for the hydraulics. I'll balance the tanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha reaches over and does it himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Work the radio and keep an eye on the fuel, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon nods and puts on the headset, trying to focus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People start SCREAMING, when they discover the menacing W OF ASH racing towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move back, people... down on the floor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The nose of the Antonov turns onto the runway. This humon plane suddenly looks small against the wall of ash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon is panicking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get going!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha hits the throttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going, we're going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A deafening THUNDER emanates from the engines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody grabs their seat as the vibration of the aircra builds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Antonov steadily gains speed as it rumbles down the cracked and uneven runway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The canyon that has swallowed half the city looms ahead. behind them the volcanic cloud bears down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha stares down the gap ahead, determined. Gordon's fac as white as a sheet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not gonna make it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! We will!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The violent cloud has finally reached the airport. The terminals are hit by flying debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seconds later, Yuri's Gulfstream is whipped through the a shattering the huge windows into a thousand pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are thrown like rag dolls as the jet explodes in a massive fireball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate and Jackson hold their kids tight. Tamara clings to little Caesar and Yuri to his twins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Antonov lumbers heavily towards the inevitable drop o on the horizon. The runway is way too short...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And to make matters worse, the ground begins to move agai slowly arching the tarmac upwards, creating a crooked ram the end of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A drop of sweat trickles down Sasha's forehead as he pull back the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon holds on for dear life as the huge plane barely li off, veering sideways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Antonov is on a collision course with the crumbling casino towers along the other side of the rim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GOVNO! (shit). Help me pull!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon grabs the wheel on his side, helping Sasha pull up beast of a plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very slowly the plane starts to rise and Sasha's face lig up. They barely make it over a casino called `Paris; Las Vegas'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the plane clips its wheels on a high metal structure right behind it, ripping away part of the landing gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After some struggle, Sasha manages to steady the Antonov. Gordon's face is green as he looks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was that the Eiffel Tower?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha looks over and grins. He grabs the microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we are on our way to China.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ancient monastery built atop a solitary mountain rock. the distance, the sun glistens off the peaks of the Himalayas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NENG PANG, a young monk, 20, sits with his superior and teacher LAMA YAK LA, 65. They have tea beneath a huge bro bell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Do not believe in anything simply because you have heard it, Neng.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Lin is my brother. He is working inside the big tunnels, where the ships are made.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lama remains silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is in your wisdom for us to do, great Lama... if Lin is right, if our world is indeed coming to an end?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead of answering, the Lama serves him more tea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the cup is full, the Lama doesn't stop pouring. Neng watches the tea overflow until he can no longer restrain himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's full, great Lama. It can hold no more!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lama stops pouring and looks at Neng.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like this cup, Neng, you are full of your own opinions and speculations. How can I show you wisdom unless you first empty your cup?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng bows his head in embarrassment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lama smiles to himself and takes a chain from around neck. On it hangs a set of rusty car keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful with the clutch. It tends to slide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lama throws him the keys and the young monk catches t smiling from ear to ear. They bow to each other and Neng off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lama Yak La looks after him as a father would. He gets up strikes the bronze bell with a wooden mallet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As far as you can see is a series of identical little hou The house in the foreground has a chicken coop in the gar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Pang enters the coop. We last saw her when the villa was being evacuated. She grabs one of the hens. She place its head on a woodblock and picks up a rusty hatchet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just about to strike, she hears a strange RATTLING noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An old truck comes driving towards the house. Behind the wheel sits her son Neng. She puts down the hatchet, yelli

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Bata! Neng is coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The young monk jumps out, quickly bowing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother, I got a message from Lin. He wants us to meet him in Cho Ming, at the west gate. He says he can get us on one of the ships he is working on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Pang is still holding the chicken by its throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought Lin is working on the dam?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dam is a ship, Mother. The government lied to us. There will be a big flood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chicken hangs limp in Mrs. Pang's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not here in the mountains... Let's eat first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hen panics as she puts its head back on the block, raising the hatchet again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No mother! We must pack up right away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We took a trip with the Laem Song ferry once. Your father was throwing up the whole way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens and Mr. Pang appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng, I did not know you were coming for dinner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At that moment the hatchet drops with a THUD!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The majestic Antonov is flying high in the Pacific skies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, the new Bentley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys are exploring the huge freight deck. Caesar, the little dog, is traipsing along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alec, Oleg and Noah marvel at a stylish mixture of luxury performance cars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our dad had one on order. We were supposed to get it next year.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then he cancelled it again, because of the ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah points to a 2012 Aston Martin parked further back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I was rich, I'd get one of those.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have one. How many cars does your family have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My Mom's boyfriend has a Porsche, a Carrera 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our parents are divorced too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys share a moment of understanding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing we can do about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah reaches for the door of the Bentley. To his surprise opens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow... look at this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah jumps into the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful, Noh'!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate and Lilly are still belted in next to Tamara. Jackso and Yuri sit on the other side of the Antonov.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you meet Dr. Silberman? He's great, isn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think for the same reasons you did. You know, after breast feeding two kids...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate looks at Tamara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did your husband ask you to get your's done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are not married. And we probably never will... But he paid for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet he did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did the man pay for mommy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, Lil'bee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate looks over at Jackson who's trying to make sense of Charlie's map. Tamara catches her looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your situation?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate lets out a sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Way too complicated...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the other side of the plane, Yuri has been watching th two women talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They seem to like each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess... So tell me Mr. Karpov - how much did you pay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One billion euro, per seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know Curtis, I wasn't always businessman. I am a boxer. Was my only playing when I was a boy, back in Murmansk. My coach...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... his name also Yuri... He always said: `Someone wants to beat you... he has to kill you first'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri puts his hand on Jackson's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What would you have done, if you rich like me? Just look at your gorgeous kids. And call me Yuri...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri offers his hand but Jackson doesn't shake it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha's voice comes over the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi guys. The plan is to refuel in Hawaii. So, buckle up... Gordon and I will do the rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon turns to Sasha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get this straight, Sasha. I'm not a pilot. I'm a plastic surgeon. I just took some lessons to overcome my fear of flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did you give up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It didn't work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon points to the declining altimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the wheels we lost at take- off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's 14 on each side. Some of them must still be there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that, Sasha commences the landing procedure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Antonov dives into a thick layer of clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still nothing from the tower?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two pilots stare ahead watching as the clouds slowly change color, from yellow... to orange.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare out the window in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon comes climbing down the metal ladder whispering to Jackson and Yuri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, you really oughta take a look at this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and Yuri follow Gordon back into the cockpit. The women exchange a worried glance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Jackson and Yuri enter, they don't believe their eye

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The State of Hawaii!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not good. That is not good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From above we watch as the Antonov flies over an endless ocean of fiery red lava. The Islands of Hawaii have turne into one big volcano.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much fuel do we have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not enough. We'll have to make a water landing somewhere in the South China Sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least we won't need our landing gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri wonders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lost it all... in Vegas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The damaged landing gear slowly retracts into the vast be of the Antonov as it veers off to the east.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian knocks quietly and sticks his head around the door Laura is sitting in her father's chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I come in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got nothing to say to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I do...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian enters. He has his travel bag in one hand. He look Laura and gathers himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Dad and I... we were trying to protect you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a big girl Adrian. I don't need protection. You used me. You guys had me gallivanting around the world, as part of your little cover-up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you were doing a good job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, if your name's Da Vinci or Picasso. But if you're some young talent in Podunk, Texas, sorry you're not famous enough. People like you and Anheuser and my father - you think you can play God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian takes a moment, he's desperate to make her see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what your father believed. That nature will choose itself from itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's bullshit and you know it. It's the fittest, the richest and the strongest that survive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian glances down and spots Jackson's book poking out o his bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What would you say were the chances of a first time, middle-aged writer, who barely sold 500 copies of his novel making it on board this plane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zero. What's your point?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian pulls out the book from his bag. He shows her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's called `Farewell Atlantis' and it's a fantastic read. It's part of our legacy now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura takes this in. The plane's intercom cuts through th moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Helmsley, Prof. West requests your presence immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian takes a breath, but before he leaves -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if I tried to sort some of this mess out? I need to know you can forgive me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks at him sadly, but with a little hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to know that too, Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian moves for the door. He stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more thing. Your father told me you were the most precious thing to him in the whole world... You are to me too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Adrian exits, we hold on Laura's conflicted face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cloud from the Yellowstone eruption has hit Washingto D.C. hard. Pennsylvania Avenue resembles a war zone. A te inch layer of ash lies on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates of the White House are wide open, with ash-cove rescue workers running about, resembling ghosts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President has turned the whole West Wing into a shelt He walks through the packed rooms assisting where he can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An old African-American LADY holds a crying young girl. President Wilson kneels down to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She can't find her mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you two girls make yourself comfy on that big couch? I'll see what I can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The child nods. The President gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sally, can you take care of them. I'll go check with the Red Cross...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he leaves, the old lady looks up at Sally and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No wonder the First Lady fell for him. I knew Miss Dorothy Jones long before the President, when she was still singing jazz down in Atlanta with Harry Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, she was amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President walks up to the Red Cross tents placed on t front lawn. He stops one of the Red Cross volunteers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who can help me with missing persons?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without looking up, the young guy responds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry man, I'm busy right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He then recognizes who he's talking to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, of course sir. I didn't realize... What can I do for you, Mr. President?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President pats him on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about it. You're doing a great job son...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A deep, low rumble begins, stopping everybody in place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it builds, the President grabs onto a tent pole to sec himself. He looks out over Washington D.C. His eyes grow wide...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The National Mall bends like rubber. The towering Washing Monument breaks into pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An even more deafening sound makes him turn--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Capitol Building rises from behind the trees, lifted by earth's incredible force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the whole building breaks apart, the President is thro to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the officers and scientists are glued to monitors tha show satellite images from all over the globe. Adrian and Prof. West stare in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The capitol was hit by a 9.4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura enters the command center unnoticed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lost communication with the White House, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands there frozen, emotionless. She looks over to Anheuser, who is shouting orders. Another officer hands h phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Makarenko for you sir. He's just entered Chinese air space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser takes the phone and after a beat answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's affirmative, Mr. President. Until communication is restored, I am in command.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian and Laura look to each other baffled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... It seems all other Heads of State are en route, however there are unconfirmed reports that the Italian Prime Minister has also decided to stay behind and trust in prayer rather than action...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pope Benedict XVI holds mass in St. Peter's Basilica. Millions of followers flood Vatican City. It's a sea of candles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amidst the mass of believers we see the Italian Prime Minister Antonioni with his family clinging to him. They are praying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A low RUMBLE. People look around frightened. In the dista we hear SCREAMING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few cardinals huddle together in silent prayer under Michelangelo's famous fresco. Most prominent above them i `The Creation of Adam'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cardinals look up in horror as the rumbling intensifi A crack forms on the ceiling, shooting straight through G touching the finger of Adam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the whole fresco breaks apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people in St. Peter's square begin to panic--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire Vatican is lifted up in the air. We hold on th Prime Minister and his family, as the basilica collapses the fleeing masses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The giant statue of `Christ the Redeemer' on Mount Corcov Behind it, we see Rio de Janeiro being obliterated by vio quakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The famous statue of Jesus Christ begins to topple over a crashes down the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng Pang, the young Tibetan monk drives his truck up a b mountain pass. His parents huddle in the back of the pick

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The steering wheel is vibrating badly in his hands as he slides the clutch and downshifts. As the vehicle slows on steep incline, the vibrations become much worse. Neng wor that the truck may be breaking down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls up and switches off the engine but to his surpri the steering wheel continues to vibrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking out the windshield, he sees the whole earth shaki violently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Hold on back there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocks fall all around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson sits inside one of the luxury cars and tries the radio. Kate opens the passenger door and gets in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couldn't sleep huh? Me neither.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, just static. Not even an emergency signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't think about what's going on down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson switches off the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted to thank you. For coming back for us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I couldn't have left you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. They both look out through the front windshield Lilly and Noah curled up together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think people change?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By `people' are we talking about me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think you've changed since we separated?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I certainly eat a lot more cereal now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you always had tunnel vision. You could always just block things out and write. You blocked all of us out Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thinks about this and can't help asking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you love him? Gordon...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love him enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate gets out of the car and shuts the door. He watches h go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The computers buzz with the incoming data.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Cho Ming reports the first tremors, however none higher than 5.0.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser looks relieved. Then the big news hits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crust has begun to shift, Prof. West.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By what degree?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1.2 percent, but still moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any clue what to expect next, Professor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once the movement of our land masses comes to a halt, we expect the formation of tidal waves, sir... proportional to the magnitude of the corresponding quakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian looks distressed as he turns to one of the officer

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have any news from the Japanese seaboard?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura notices Adrian's concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've recorded two quakes averaging 8.3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs Adrian's hand. Anheuser sees this and his suspicions about them are confirmed. A cold little smile appears on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony is watching TV with a group of passengers. Harry has just entered and stands near the back of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TEENAGE BOY with bad acne searches for an available cha that is still broadcasting. He finds a news program with lousy reception.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Tokyo seems to have taken the severity of the hit... Unconfirmed reports indicate that the entire island of Japan is below water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The signal gets weaker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry watches Tony slowly stand up. As he turns to his friend, his knees begin to buckle. His face is pale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I called... But I never got through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony only stares back at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind them, the TV rolls to the side, as the whole room begins to tilt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry grabs on to the door frame, as the passengers along with Tony fall like dominoes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the ship rolls to the side, Harry finds himself hangin from the door frame now 20 feet off the ground. He's bare able to pull himself up and roll onto the middle deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On his back, Harry is shocked to see the star field and t moon shifting across the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An eerie sound fills the air. A gigantic swell has formed to his right. It's a mountain of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry turns to see another gargantuan swell close in from other side of the `Freedom of the Seas'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old walled city of Shibam is in ruins. The 2,000-year towers lie on the desert ground. Hundreds of believers ha gathered to pray towards Mecca.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they raise their hands to heaven in unison, they slow their motion and the chanting dissipates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare into the distance not knowing if what they see reality or only a mirage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A monstrous tidal wave rises from the desert sands thunde towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Wilson's body lays between the rubble. As he sl regains consciousness, all he can hear is the flapping so of the collapsed Red Cross tents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As President Wilson gets to his feet, he sees--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tidal wave come sweeping over the remains of the Washin Mall and it carries with it the battleships of the 14th F of the US Navy that were anchored in Chesapeake Bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President looks ahead, calm and peaceful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm coming home Dorothy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA follows the aircraft carrier `USS John F. Kenn as it slams broadside into the White House.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hushed voices. Anheuser, Adrian and Prof. West stand amon a group of officers and analysts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All global ground communication has ceased sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only signal our satellites are picking up are coming from the vessels in Cho Ming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least some good news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser turns to Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would our science advisor care to give us his assessment?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We expect enormous tsunamis to reach landfall in every continent. The Cho Ming area will be impacted in approximately six hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods to one of the analysts, who types in a couple of commands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and it looks like the crust has shifted by nearly 23 degrees in a south- westerly direction. Here's the computer simulation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody stares as the graphic illustrates what happened planet Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our data also shows, that our earth's poles have reversed their magnetic fields...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... These are their new positions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser looks at the monitor, then turns to Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So Helmsley, what you're telling us here is that... the north pole is now somewhere in Wisconsin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. Adrian clears his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the south pole, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ALARM SIGNAL goes off--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A red light blinks on the plane's instrument panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engine failure. GOVNO! Two of six are down. We must get ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri and Jackson are standing behind the pilots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go wake up the kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri nods and they make their way back to the lower deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson's family are all asleep in their seats, Lilly in mom's lap. She looks like a little angel. Jackson can't b to wake them. He caresses Lilly's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you hate Gordon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson turns to see Noah is awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? I don't hate Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you don't like him either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know him that well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I know him. He's really nice. You should talk to him more often. You guys would get along really well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This breaks Jackson's heart. He pulls Noah tightly to his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll give it a try, Noah. I promise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate opens her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wake up Lil'bee. We're getting ready to land.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the opposite side of the aircraft, Yuri and Tamara hel the twins get into their life vests. Noah is suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks at his kids. They both look scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha told us, it could get a little bumpy... and wet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Antonov jerks to the side. Two more engines out. Alar signals flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The remaining two engines barely hold the plane in the ai it dives into the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his family huddle together. He puts his arms around Lilly and Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your daddy has to tell you something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, Gordon climbs down from the cockpit. H about to speak when he hears Jackson's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know that with my writing and work I didn't have a lot of time for you both...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson glances at Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wasn't there for you, the way I should have been.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks Kate directly in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... And I am so very sorry for that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon watches as Kate pulls the kids and Jackson tight. the first time, they seem a little like the family they o were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson, Yuri... I think you guys should come back up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First Jackson and then Yuri enter the cockpit. Sasha poin out of the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't ask me how that happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind them Yuri and Jackson stare at the snow covered mountains of the Himalayas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no more ocean, and it looks like we're pretty close to where we wanted to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's as if the whole earth shifted by 1500 miles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's called 'Earth Crust Displacement' Gordon... Prof. Hapgood, 1958.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson brims with joy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Way to go Charlie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lost our last two engines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane drops rapidly, nearly scraping the tip of a mountain. Sasha and Gordon are doing all they can to keep Antonov in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A vast glacier spreads out in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll shoot for that glacier. Drain the brake fluids. It's going to get rocky... There, the blue levers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane plummets, loosing altitude fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen up guys! This may sound a little crazy, but here's what you got to do...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and Yuri come running. Yuri yells at his boys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Get up! Follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri bear, what are we doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're taking the Bentley!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha is struggling with the gyrating wheel. The glitteri snow field comes flying towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHTO ZA... Gordon! We're still too fast!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha pulls the Antonov back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now! Open it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon yanks with all his might. A loud NOISE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cargo door drops open. The Antonov is extremely close the glacier's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson tries to start the Bentley, but nothing happens. Everyone screams in panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHUT UP EVERY ONE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all go quiet, except for a few muffled barks from Caesar. Yuri speaks towards the dashboard, slowly and clearly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engine... start...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The motor revs to life. Yuri looks at Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Voice control... Sold me on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha barely holds on. He yells at Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your turn Gordon! Go! Make sure that they make it out of here before I touch down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be fine! I have to land this thing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you waiting for!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha nods at him reassuringly. Gordon bolts out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cargo door scrapes against the glacier, hurling ice everywhere. The Bentley roars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Push it Curtis!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're waiting for Sasha and Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah turns and sees Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara! Open the door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon jumps in. Tamara yells at him in desperation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Sasha?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He said he'll be fine and we should get out of here before he touches down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri notices Tamara's distress as she keeps looking back the cockpit. Jackson slams the pedal down trying to gain much speed as possible to soften their landing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daaadddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bentley shoots out the back of the plane. As it hits snow, the air bags deploy cushioning the passengers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Antonov hits the ice and catapults the rest of the lu cars out of the back cargo hold. They barrel past the Ben like skittles, narrowly missing it as they fly off in opposite directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane skids across the glacier, clipping its wing and causing the aircraft to break apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sasha has no control anymore and watches helplessly as he shoots towards the ledge in the Antonov, plunging into th deep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane crashes and explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the snow settles we see that the glacier is scattered luxury cars tomb-stoned in the snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bentley is half buried. We hear Caesar barking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody okay back there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens and Jackson climbs out, looking around. Ju above the wind, he hears the SOUND OF HELICOPTER BLADES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One by one the others appear behind Jackson and stare at surreal sight--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several Chinese Mil-26 choppers airlift animals over the mountain pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GIRAFFES, ZEBRAS, EVEN ELEPHANTS hang by huge straps from these flying machines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the smaller helicopters veers from the transport f and lands near the Bentley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Armed soldiers jump out. Their Commander speaks to them i sharp tone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to the People's Republic of China.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson nods to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you... (to Lilly and Noah) Say thank you, kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others acknowledge the soldiers as well. Hi... Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What color are your passes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson stands dumbfounded. The Commander repeats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What color are your boarding passes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still no answer. He yells an order. The soldiers point th guns at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have green card.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surprised, Jackson turns to Yuri who's holding up three g plastic cards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For my boys and me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara can't believe what she's hearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a joke... a mistake...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right Yuri?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri shrugs. Tamara lunges at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) You disgust me. You pig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri brushes her off, coldly. And then speaks so they can understand him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I did not know about you and Sasha? May god rest that poor bastard's soul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that Yuri turns to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am sorry guys. Good luck. And Jackson remember, if someone wants to beat you... he has to kill you first. Come boys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins grab Caesar and climb into the helicopter. The barks furiously, wanting to stay with Tamara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The next moment, the helicopter takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!... Did that just happen!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're stranded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Air Force One is in the background as Laura, Anheuser, an other members of the crew are rushed towards a group of waiting helicopters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian is a little way back in the middle of the pack. A Chinese Officer with a list shouts over the noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Anheuser - you're in Chopper 1. Dr. Wilson the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura and Anheuser reach the chopper. An authoritative Na Officer greets them, and raises his voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Captain Richard Michaels. I'm the skipper of the American boat sir. After you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser nods and climbs in the chopper. Captain Michaels helps Laura in. Adrian arrives just as the Chopper door slides shut and it lifts off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura catches Adrian's look of unease before they soar aw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My sincerest condolences Dr. Wilson, for your father...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura's look thanks him for this. He turns to Anheuser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your party is the last to arrive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been told of damages?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We haven't completed the assessment but it looks like we lost Number 4 when the crust shifted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Michaels looks up and points into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There it is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA follows the choppers revealing--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nine gigantic oval gates that measure at least 60 stories built into the face of a mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In front of every gate there is a line of huge `Y' shaped metal support structures, which are the launching towers the ships. They are each at least 800 feet high. It's an unparalleled feat of engineering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead chopper descends onto a platform in front of one the gates, dwarfed against this majestic setting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door slides open and Anheuser jumps out. Laura follow She looks around in awe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even the utility entrances that lead into the mountain ar immense. The Captain guides them into the hollow mountain

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the BACKGROUND we see an angry Yuri scream and argue w military personnel, waving his tickets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do mean we can't board Number 4? I want to speak to your supervisor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the supervisor! Now get in line with all the others while we make arrangements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want your name!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing to his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you read? Now get the hell back with the other green cards, or I'll have you detained.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins stand nearby, holding Caesar. They look afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his group are small specks in a barren landsc They have made it down the glacier and are now walking ov scree field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is hard going. Jackson carries Lilly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep thinking warm thoughts sweetheart. You're doing great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate holds Noah by the hand. Gordon and Tamara trail behi She's still very upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should have listened to you, Dr. Silberman. I actually liked the way I looked before that monster talked me into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you know he asked for a discount... and he paid in installments?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheap bastard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're better off without him. What he said about you and Sasha, is it true?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara nods silently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that he's gone I think he was worth a hundred times a man like Yuri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly they hear the PUTTERING of an engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys hear that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the distance, an old rusty truck comes bumping down th dirt road. Jackson puts down Lilly and chases after it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng and his parents drive past, billowing a huge cloud o dust just as Jackson reaches the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Hey! Help! Wait for us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Neng doesn't hear him over the rattling truck. Jackso pissed, kicks at the rocks on the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit! Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, Neng's mother, sitting in the back of the truc turns and sees his tantrum. She bangs on the rear window the cabin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng looks in the mirror and hits the brakes. Jackson can believe his luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others show up and they all run towards the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser and Laura follow Captain Michaels and a Chinese Steward over one of the many boarding bridges erected ins the cavernous mountain that lead to one of the monstrous arks. Laura stops halfway, gazing in awe--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deep down below, thousands of workers are swarming over t ship, readying it for launch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks up and sees the contrast, spotting the SHEIK met in the Dorchester Hotel as he boards comfortably with huge family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura points down at the workers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Michaels? What happens to all those people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain doesn't know what to say. Anheuser turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Wilson, there's a protocol for all that. You just stick to your art. We'll handle the rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura hates him in that moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain? Where is the Bridge?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser and Captain Michaels move away as Laura stands a watches the frantic workers who are now boarding the anim we saw being airlifted over the mountains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Wilson? Your cabin is this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura has a look of guilt as she follows the steward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thousands are on the march up the mountains. Behind them valley stretches into the horizon. Plumes of smoke rise f destroyed cities in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amongst the refugees, we discover Satnam, the young astrophysicist, holding his little son. The rest of Satna family trails behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Distant WARNING SIRENS pierce the silent march, coming fr the cities below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People start to scream and run, but Satnam stands there frozen. He fumbles for his satellite phone, then hits a number on its speed dial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian is unpacking. He lays down his copy of `Farewell Atlantis' just as his cell phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the Nampan Plateau...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian's face goes pale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a tidal wave coming from the East! It's huge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam, what happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We never got picked up, Adrian, the airlift never came!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam swallows hard. He stares out into the valley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wall of undulating foam and debris comes rolling toward him. A tidal wave of gigantic height.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody panics and scratches for a higher elevation. Bu for Satnam it is clear, they do not stand a chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He picks up his little son, squeezing him tightly to his chest, humming an Indian lullaby for the scared child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian hears SCREAMING on the phone and the deafening sou of the approaching wave. He tenses up, desperate but unab to do anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the noise reaches its height, the line goes dead. Adri is left breathless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian storms onto the bridge. Many officers and analysts at work under Captain Michaels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have the latest satellite images of Napam, India?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One moment, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser and Prof. West step over and join him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helmsley, what's going on here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like our model was wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all stare at the monitor showing several tidal waves coming in from the south.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam was talking about a wave from the East.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A science officer selects a different quadrant on the satellite display. They all stare at the new tidal wave that's coming from the East of the Cho Ming valley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser is shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does this mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flooding will happen earlier. Bobby, can you plug in the new data please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the officer does this, Prof. West looks at Adrian with questioning eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satnam didn't get picked up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prof. West is horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian turns back to the monitor and sees the new tidal w that is coming towards the Cho Ming valley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This one is at least 1500    meters high!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk to me Helmsley. What does this mean for us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby, plug in the new data and adjust the count down?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every one on the bridge stares at a display. It reads--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 02hrs - 09min - 07sec

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The science officer nervously hits a few keys and the dis changes to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 00hrs - 28min - 10sec... and counting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the shock on Anheuser's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get me the other Heads of State.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng's truck, loaded with Jackson and the others, creeps to the service entrance of the launch site.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lone figure awaits them. This is Neng's older brother L who we saw signing up for the 'Chinese Dam Project'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin notices the strangers in the pick-up truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Who are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng answers hesitantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We found them by the side of the road, my brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must send them back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am a follower of the great Lama Yak La. You know I cannot do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others watch the interaction but do not understand. Jackson senses a problem. He grabs Lilly and Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come with daddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and Tamara stare perplexed as Jackson approaches L with his kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least take our children with you. Please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin answers in broken English.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why should I do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the same reason you sent for your parents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin stares at him stone faced. In desperation, Kate turns Mrs. Pang.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no clue if you understand what I'm saying, but I ask you as a mother, please take my kids with you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. A beat. The old Chinese lady turns to Lin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) We are all children of this earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My plan will not work for so many, mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up at her son, determined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will take them all. Bata?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Pang nods and reluctantly, Lin motions to Jackson to follow. Kate bows to Mrs. Pang.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you ma'am. Thank you so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and the others acknowledge what Kate has done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We finally reveal the unbelievable magnitude of this ship yard, built into the hollow belly of the mountains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nine gargantuan vessels are lined up next to each other. Their size is at least four times that of the `Freedom of Seas'. However, they look more like spaceships than anyth having been built aerodynamically to withstand the full f of nature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But only three of these monstrous ARKS are complete. Numb is being repaired, all the others are still under construction, surrounded by scaffolding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly SIRENS goes off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boarding bridges to the finished vessels begin to retract. There's growing confusion among the thousands of workers and security personnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Opposite the boarding bridges, on a large platform, Yuri his boys sit in line with the other waiting passengers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
