dialogues.text: They watch as massive stern gates begin to close. Yuri ju up and yells to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're leaving without us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The soldier from earlier points his gun at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did I tell you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caesar barks at the guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! Idiot! They are leaving you behind too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The soldier turns to the ships and Yuri knocks him out. H grabs his boys and runs towards the closing gates. All th other passengers surge forward with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the distance, on the bow side of the ships, the huge mountain gates of the bay open, revealing a stunning view Cho Ming Valley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin leads his group over a ridge. In front of their eyes-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates to the mountain open!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) We have to hurry! (to Jackson) They launch! We run out of time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They follow Lin rushing down the hill, towards one of the many Y-shaped launch structures towering in front of the gates. Neng and Kate help Mr. and Mrs. Pang down the rock terrain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A screeching and thundering noise!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE THREE COMPLETED VESSELS BEGIN TO INCH FORWARD on meta girders connecting the Y-shaped launch towers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura feels a jolt. She rushes out of her small cabin and into a swarm of people moving down a crammed endless corridor. She struggles to fight her way through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A digital voice blares over the speakers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Countdown to departure. Launch in 17 minutes - 42 seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura bumps into one of Adrian's Science Officers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where can I find Adrian Helmsley?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in the Technical Command Centre. Follow me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three gigantic vessels emerge from the mountain, into open. Support helicopters swarm around them like flies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin and his group look like ants as they scale the metal ladders of one of the launch towers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Verbal commands fly back and forth. Anheuser watches the preparations from a large window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over to the command bridges of the other vessels they continue to be pulled into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We cut to the various Heads of State, all at their comman posts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hatch opens at the top of the launch tower. Lin is the first to climb out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right before his eyes, the hull of the American Ship slow creeps towards him. He's but a speck against this man-mad behemoth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin hastily pulls the others up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Faster, Neng! Help father! Mother, give me your hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a race against time. The huge ship's hull closes in fast. Lin and his family crawl up the side arm while Jack hurries to pull up the rest of the group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly freezes at the sight of the approaching ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move Lil'bee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson rips her out of harm's way, just in time. In a frenzy, he pushes her up the support arm where the others already huddled on a small platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the towering wall of steel passes by them, inches from their faces, Mr. Pang loses his balance. Jackson and Lin see this, but Jackson is closer--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs the old man by his arm, saving him from falling his death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time, Lin acknowledges Jackson with a nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three completed ships are half way out, grinding to t final launching position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mob of passengers led by Yuri has fought their way to t ship. More and more people join them, including soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin, Jackson and the group are huddled on the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of SCREAMING PEOPLE makes them turn. The stormi masses have arrived at the access platform. There is now huge drop off between them and the tails of the ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god, that's Yuri!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next to Yuri are his twins, holding Caesar. She yells!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caesar!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little dog hears Tamara and jumps out of Oleg's arms, leaping onto one of the thick cables, that connects the platform with the launching towers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alec and Oleg attempt to run after Caesar, but Yuri grabs them by their necks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let that stupid dog go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's panicked. The arriving masses are pushing them to th drop off at the edge of the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship has reached its targeted position. A small hatch lines up directly in front of Lin and his group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Okay. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One by one they all climb into the hatch. Jackson being t last in, notices that Tamara has stayed back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara! Come on! Get in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She doesn't move, anxiously waiting for her beloved dog darting towards her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mob pushes at Yuri and his boys. Passengers on either side tumble off the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri watches one of them fall, hitting his head against a tiny ledge 8 feet below. To his right, he sees a small la leading down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Down there! Oleg, you go first!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they hurry down the ladder, people keep tumbling into deep. Reaching the ledge, Oleg discovers Caesar running towards Tamara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy look, Tamara!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri cannot believe his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hatch behind Tamara begins to move. The hydraulic supports are being lifted, sealing up the vessel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caesar darling!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson reaches out from the closing hatch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara! Get in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara climbs inside the hatch and turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come to mommy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caesar leaps into her arms only seconds before the hatch seals. As a last gesture, Tamara sticks out her arm and g Yuri the finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin leads the group into a long and narrow chamber where hydraulics for the tail gate are located.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens a tool cabinet, retrieving a giant electrical po drill, almost too big to be carried by one person.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin climbs to a hatch near the ceiling and begins to unsc the huge bolts. He looks at Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura and the Science Officer enter the Technical Command Center. She finds Adrian staring at a wall of monitors showing the horrifying scenario on the platforms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are falling to their deaths in large numbers in th desperation to board the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What in god's name is happening Adrian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser convinced them all to launch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, panicking workers, screaming for their life! Deserted passengers waving their green cards!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian makes a decision and rushes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser turns hearing Adrian storming onto the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser! We have to stop this madness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that, Adrian turns to the Communication Officer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby, make sure the other bridges can hear this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The officer hesitates as Laura enters in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think you're doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know exactly what I'm doing. (To Bobby) Turn it on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby flicks a switch. Adrian's voice echoes through all ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Adrian Helmsley, science advisor to President Wilson...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The German Chancellor turns to one of the technicians on bridge of the European Ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you please turn up the volume, Mr. Hoffmann?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next to her stand the British and French Prime Ministers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know we've all been involved in making difficult decisions... to save our human civilization...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser looks on stoney faced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... But to be human means to care for each other, and civilization means to work together to create a better life. If that's true there is nothing human and nothing civilized about what we're doing here. Ask yourselves ... Can we really stand by and let all those people out there die?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura watches him proudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A civilization that allows that, does not deserve to survive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or at least I don't want to be part of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser cuts in with sarcasm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll miss you Helmsley but somehow we'll get by. Officer switch that off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Communications Officer looks at Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's an order soldier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Russian President, together with the heads of state f China and Japan, listen in as Adrian responds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to open our gates and let these people in. All of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser has had enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you lost your mind? Look at the countdown. We have less than five minutes left... And none of our ships have the resources to feed those people. If you save them today we all starve tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's almost screaming now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you wanna be responsible for the extinction of the human race? Can you handle that, Adrian?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian's battle seems lost. But he doesn't give up, and instead speaks softly now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a young astrophysicist from India who is the reason we are all here, trying to give mankind a second chance. He's the one who discovered it all, the one who connected the dots. We all owe him our lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes are glued to Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just learned that he was killed with his family by a tsunami in eastern India. You know why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian stares Anheuser in the eyes as he continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He died because we forgot to pick him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I beg you... whatever our future holds don't let us start it with an act of cruelty. What will you tell your children... and their children?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. Laura steps up alongside Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If my father were here, he would open the gates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian and Laura share a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people of Russia along with...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His Asian colleagues nod in approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... China and Japan agree to open the gates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The German Chancellor speaks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The United Kingdom, Spain, France and Germany, and I believe I can also speak for the Italian Prime Minister...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... We vote to open the gates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura and Adrian watch Anheuser shaking his head in defea Bobby, the Communications Officer smiles with relief. Adr turns to the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Michaels, you heard them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One by one the gigantic gates at the stern of the three s begin to creek open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The masses gathered on the platform CHEER wildly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly crawls through the CONNECTING TUNNEL meeting up wit Kate in a large bay on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phew... It stinks in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together with Neng and his parents, they all look up in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Giraffe, chewing her cud, smiles down at them. Caesar b at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sssh...Caesar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second later, hundreds of different ANIMALS RESPOND. Th are in the zoological bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon helps Noah up the small ladder leading to the connecting tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just as he goes to hand him Jackson's backpack, the HYDRA MOTORS begin to GROWL! Lin looks up in panic. He screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're opening the gate! It will crush us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole ceiling begins to lower towards them. From down below, Jackson sees his son about to be hit by it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah! Watch out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon makes a split second decision. With all his streng he shoves the boy into the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the other side of the tunnel, Kate watches as the me ceiling misses Noah by a hair, but catches Gordon, wiping off the ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson watches helplessly as Gordon falls past him. He survives his landing and desperately tries to grab on to sloping surface, but he can't. He slips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon is crushed between the gears, sharing his last loo with Jackson before he dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate helps a trembling Noah out of the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something happened, mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate pulls him close and shuts her eyes tightly. She figh back the tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and Lin know they're running out of time, their remaining space is shrinking every second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to stop it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin grabs the huge electrical power drill nearby and atte to jam it between the hydraulic arm and the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it digs deeper into the metal, the hydraulic starts to slow down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still on the ledge, Yuri and the boys watch as the huge boarding gate lowers towards them. They are trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, the gates begin to slow, but surely they will crushed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the chamber, Lin still struggles with the drill. Suddenly he slips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson manages to catch his fall. But in the process Lin foot gets caught between the gears, mangling it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He screams in pain as the hydraulic slowly grinds towards halt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it, man. You did it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In great pain, Lin grins back at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates of the ships hit the access platform with a thundering noise. People begin to rush on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarm signals go off. The Captain turns to one of his officers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with the gate?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. Maybe there's something jamming it, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The countdown on the monitor reads 2 min. 40 sec. Laura a Adrian share a worried look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a HOLLOW BELL ring!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lama Yak La rings the large bronze bell of his monastery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The booming sound echoes through the Cho Ming valley. As gentle wind catches the Lama's clothes, he looks up--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tidal wave of immeasurable proportion crests the mounta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lama continues to strike the bell as the monastery is wiped clean from the earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The technicians desperately try to figure out what's wron An officer waves Adrian over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we have a breach in the zoological bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you zoom in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The video camera moves in on Kate, Noah and Lilly. Adrian can't believe his eyes. He turns to Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know those kids. Remember the book I told you about? Their father wrote it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Michaels shouts across the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're loaded. We can close the gates sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser looks nervously at the countdown. It reads 1:34

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above Yuri and the boys, people are leaping from the acce platform onto the stern gate of the American ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri looks for a hole in the flow of people before seizin his chance and lifting the first of his boys up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Pull yourself up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oleg manages to reach up and hold onto the gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the ship, officers yell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To the lower decks people!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates suddenly screech back into life and begin to cl Yuri doubles his efforts lifting Alec higher, but Alec ca quite reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri strains with all his effort before deciding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oleg! Catch your brother!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuri leaps forward holding Alec out in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oleg manages to grab his brother's hands as Yuri lets go falls into the deep crevasse below. He makes no noise unt he hits the rocks beneath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oleg pulls his brother from above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SIREN blasts. Both of Yuri's sons are now on deck. A loading officer pulls them back, away from the gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boys, you gotta move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We wait for our father! He's still down there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The loading officer attempts to comfort them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no one down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on boys, come...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Officer and the boys look back as the stern gate slow closes. But with a SCREECHING sound it grinds to a halt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gate is jammed open leaving a twenty foot gap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALARMS sound. Anheuser and the Captain stare at the monit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is the stern gate not closing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's wrong with the hydraulics, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain, over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They race over. Adrian points to a monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we found the problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the monitor, they see Sarah and the others desperately waiting for Jackson and Lin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did they get in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must have come through the hydraulic chamber. There...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby, the Surveillance Officer, selects a different came and we now see inside the tunnel in which Jackson is pull along a wounded Lin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That guy is injured. Something must have gone wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're damn right something went wrong! Congratulations Helmsley, you may have just killed us all but as long as your conscience is clean...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian tries to ignore this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get an emergency crew there right now. I'll meet them at the Hydraulic Chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser sneers him, shooting a look to Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you're the main man now, just because your fucking the President's daughter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without thinking, Adrian turns and punches Anheuser hard the face. He drops to the floor, out cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone stands in stunned silence. Laura smiles. Adrian looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you all waiting for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They speed off. The countdown reads 0 min. 53 sec.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Further down in the valley, the tidal wave has reached th Cho Ming airfield, blasting away the planes with overwhel force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The massive propellers of the ships begin to turn. Howeve the props of the American ship don't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, the huge tidal wave comes thundering towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An IMPACT WARNING sounds as Adrian and Laura race through crammed hallways with members of the rescue crew. One of officers explains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can't close the stern gate, then the engines won't start.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no way to override it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No sir, it has to be done manually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate, Noah and Lilly watch as Jackson nears the end of th tunnel with Lin. Neng comforts his brother who's about to pass out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) Almost there, Lin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three vessels are now engulfed in churning water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They rock back and forth. Only the huge support towers they're resting on, keep them anchored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new ALARM sounds as water begins to shoot through the o stern gate of the American ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people on the loading bay panic, among them we see Al and Oleg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same ALARM rings out in the hallways of the ship. Lau Adrian and their party are all braced against the corrido as the vessel undulates back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Water has penetrated the stern!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks unsure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rear of the ship will start sealing itself up one compartment at a time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then how will we get to the hydraulic chamber?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we don't hurry, we won't be able to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Despite the violent movement of the ship, Adrian pushes o down the corridor towards the back of the boat. They foll

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Water is also now rushing into the Zoological Bay and onl the giraffe can manage to keep her head dry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson is not yet out of the tunnel with an unconscious

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate shouts across to Tamara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara! Take Lilly and Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate reaches in to help Jackson as Tamara begins to move Lilly. Noah remains back with his mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson finally makes it through with Lin. Kate is almost tearful with relief to see him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was so worried about you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the Zoological bay begins to seal itself off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly, already in the next compartment with Tamara and he dog, screams out as a chamber door quickly slides up, fro the floor to the ceiling. It separates Lilly from her fam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mummy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and Kate turn but it's too late. They only catch glimpse of Lilly before they are sealed in. The water lev continues to rise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panicked, Tamara turns and looks around. Down the corrido in the distance, she sees Adrian, Laura and the rescue cr approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But between them she spots the next chamber door rising quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly starts moving as Tamara turns and picks up Caesar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving quickly, Lilly is able to climb up and over the fa rising door. But as she dangles from the other side, she looks down and is too scared to jump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly! Take him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly looks up and sees two hands straining to hold Caesa above the quickly narrowing gap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a courageous move, Lilly grabs the little dog before h gets crushed and together they fall to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back on the other side of the chamber door, Tamara looks around. She is trapped now as the water continues to rush

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura picks Lilly up and comforts her. Adrian realizes th are too late. He turns to the rescue crew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there any way to talk to them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly is close to tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The water continues to flood in as Jackson helps Neng wit his unconscious brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to move him higher. (looks around) Over there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a VIOLENT SHAKE throws them all off balance, pitching them into the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the debris-filled, murky waters we see that the fusela of Air Force One has slammed against the first of the shi launch towers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly it begins to bend, finally giving way. The other launch towers follow like dominos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is ripped from its anchorage and sent drifting sideways, rudderless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chaos. Fear. Everybody holds on for dear life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The vessel is swept away, over the mountain ridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alec and Oleg scream, desperately trying to hold on as th whole ship capsizes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The giant ship drifts upside down and rudderless - smashe around by the debris and raging waters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then, as it hits another ridge, it rolls right side u and seems to steady itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: However, the strong currents continue to force it through mountain ranges of the Himalayas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The officers try to regain some control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving at 34 knots, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is our position?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darjeeling valley, heading south east, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain's face drops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must be kidding!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The water rises fast as Kate sees the severity of Lin's w for the first time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need something to stop the bleeding or he'll die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A split second later Noah holds out his belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum, will this do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Jackson hears a voice over a speaker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Over a speaker) Mr. Curtis... I'm Adrian Helmsley. We met once before. Your daughter is with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate screams with relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian is using an emergency wall intercom, with Laura ne to him, holding Lilly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm alright Mom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caesar barks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara hears Caesar over the speaker in her compartment a smiles with relief. She is struggling to stay afloat thou and is running out of air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson discovers the wall speaker. He moves closer to it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't get to you. Whatever you did, jammed the hydraulics. If you can't get it out... None of us will make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes are on Adrian as he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're our only hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian looks at Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll go back. I'll try my best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll go with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stay with Mommy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks at Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be right back...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The water is up to their chest now. Jackson takes a breat and disappears underwater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back on the bridge, Anheuser regains consciousness and ge to his feet. His nose is bleeding. He looks around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain, what's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain looks at him annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're heading straight for the north face of Mount Everest, Mr. Anheuser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser looks at him dumbfounded as he stumbles to the window and sees the massive rock face of Mount Everest in distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson swims down into the dark chamber and reaches the jammed power tool, pulling at it. But it doesn't budge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The water level in Tamara's compartment is at its height and she goes under.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She struggles below the surface for a moment, looking aro desperately for a way out but there is none.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tamara drowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson manages to find an air pocket. He fills up his lu with air and thinks hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he strips off his jacket, he seems to have a plan. He dives under again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin is being held up in the water by his brother and pare

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate has wrapped the belt around his lower leg and now pu it tight. Lin screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah uses this as the moment to dive underwater, unnotice to go and help his father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back under water, Jackson is using the extension cord of power drill to pull himself down to the tool cabinet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson opens it, retrieving a giant crowbar. He begins t use it to dislodge the tool but it's hard work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser and everybody on the bridge stares as the north of Mount Everest is almost upon them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate and the Pangs are desperately close to running out o air now, but despite this, Kate still tends to Lin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a moment she turns and is first confused then horri to see that Noah is nowhere to be found.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson pulls with all his might, but he can't quite shif the drill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To his surprise, a pair of young hands join his on the ha of the crowbar. Noah is alongside him now, helping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Working as father and son, they manage, little by little, loosen it before finally the drill comes free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian gives Noah the thumbs up and the boy heads back to surface. Jackson goes to follow but in the last moment he spots the knapsack containing his laptop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He dives back down for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah emerges from the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, we did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate pulls him to her, relieved he is safe. Noah smiles a calls out towards the nearly submerged speaker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly and Laura wait nervously. They hear a muffled voice

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got it free. Can you hear me? We did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian leaps up when he hears this. He flicks a button on intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Michaels - close the gate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hearing this, the Captain yells the eagerly awaited order

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's affirmative. Close the gate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ay, ay, Sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a BOOMING sound as the tail gate finally seals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson reaches his knapsack, but when sees Noah's cell p lying next to it, he makes a decision and reaches for tha instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hears the muffled sound of the engines and smiles. But he turns to swim back, his face freezes--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's looking into the lifeless eyes of Gordon, who floats inches from his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gigantic propellers fight against the current, hittin rock at the base of the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The battle seems hopeless. Captain Michaels yells at the of his lungs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engage starboard stabilizers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One is engaged... two is engaged... number three is out, sir!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The vessel scrapes against the rocks, throwing Anheuser t the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The giant ship escapes the mountain with an inch to spare

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone on the bridge watches in awe as Mount Everest, earth's highest peak, drifts slowly past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a long beat, they begin to holler and cheer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate hears the CHEERING coming from the speakers. The wat level stops rising but she still looks around in panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah! Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah begins to cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was just behind me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally! Jackson bursts out of the water and takes a lung of wonderful air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate and Noah are overjoyed. The Pangs smile to one anoth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks Kate squarely in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you would ever consider to give me another chance... I promise, I'll always be there when you need me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate embraces him tightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you do... I will never let you go again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah is all smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Day 988. No one is waiting for anything to happen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA moves over the last lines of Jackson's novel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian sits in his cabin, his copy of `Farewell Atlantis' his lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...   and all we can hear is the sound of our   own breathing that reminds us we are   still sharing our memories, hopes and   ideas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Opposite him, Laura sits listening to him read.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... And funny, just today we found out that the entire crew of the Atlantis, somehow or another, has relatives in Wisconsin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian closes the book. There's a moment of silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many copies did you say that sold?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Less than 500. (with a smile) It's what you might call a cult classic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks at him grinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It seems we have very different tastes Mr. Helmsley?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well that's healthy Dr. Wilson. Something we could maybe explore... unless you have other pressing engagements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually my diary's pretty open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The intimate moment is cut short.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over loudspeaker) Mr. Helmsley to the bridge please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian and Laura make their way to the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, this is Captain Michaels speaking. In a few minutes, I will be giving the orders to unseal the decks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his family stand amongst thousands of other people who are gathering in anticipation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please be careful when you step out and of course... enjoy the fresh air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson kneels down and zips up Lilly's jacket. She is holding Caesar, whose still wearing his diamond collar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy? When can we go back home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothing we can go back to Lil'bee. Whatever's out there, that's our home now. Don't be scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not Daddy. No more pull-ups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my big girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson squeezes Lilly's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we pet him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lilly turns to see Yuri's boys standing next to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you can. He's your doggie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys both smile at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian and Laura enter the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You called for me, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prof. West has something to show you, Mr. Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain directs him to a monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like your scientific projections are way off again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain grins at Prof. West.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The water is receding much faster than we projected, Adrian...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A monitor reveals an image of the African continent, howe its shape changed dramatically. The image of the southern is enlarged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's hard to believe, but the Himalayas are no longer the roof of the world. It's now the Drakensberg mountains of Kwa-Zulu Natal. The whole African continent has risen several thousand feet and most likely, never even flooded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our European colleagues have already set course for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Michaels hands Adrian a short wave radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, somebody wants to talk to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian curious, grabs the mic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a muffled, raspy voice through the speakers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry Helmsley stands beside the cruise ship's Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, this is Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad!... Is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian is ecstatic. Captain Michaels explains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should have a visual of the `Freedom of the Seas' shortly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad. We're coming to pick you guys up. How's Tony?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry looks over at Tony who's listening, smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's fine, son. We're all fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you guys soon. Bye dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry hangs up. He picks up Tony, embracing him wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian, still excited from speaking with his dad, grabs L and kisses her on the lips. She squeals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put that woman down Helmsley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian looks at Anheuser, unsure of what he might say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young guys like you with your idealistic dreams, you think you can change the world...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian and Laura exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just pray to God, that you keep on making the right calls... in this new world of ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian nods and with a smile to Laura turns to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Helmsley, one more thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian turns back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was no one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pardon me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was no white kid better than you. I'm terribly sorry I said that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anheuser puts out his hand. Adrian takes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your Captain speaking. Standby to open Deck 1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing by Sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neng pushes his brother Lin in a wheelchair onto the deck next to his parents. Mrs. Pang turns to her husband.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Chinese) I wonder will the clouds look the same and the stars?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do not fear. Some things will never change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old Chinese man forces a little smile. Closer to the front of this crowd Jackson approaches Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you might want this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes Noah's cell phone from his pocket and hands it t him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think I'll still get a signal ... Dad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson is touched to hear him use that word. He smiles a hugs him. Adrian, Laura and Anheuser arrive alongside the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I finally finished your book Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really? You may well be the first person who ever got to the end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson looks at her, smiling playfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, I believe he's addressing the author. Well, what did you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say... those astronauts of yours would be shitting themselves, if they knew all their relatives are now stuck in the South Pole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a horn sounds and the sealed deck doors let off burst of pressurised air. A murmur goes through the crowd

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is silent as the huge deck doors slowly begin to roll back and light streams in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pang family try to see over people's heads, even Anhe looks hopeful. Jackson pulls his family close as the firs rays of daylight hit their faces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hatches unseal all around the ship. Sun streams through t clouds. Everywhere people emerge outside, into the light day. A majestic moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all stare in awe at the waters receding against the covered mountain peaks. Caesar lets out a YELP of joy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost as soon as the doors have opened, the ship's HELICOPTERS take off, flying towards a stunning site--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The `Freedom of the Seas' is perched on a mountain peak, surrounded by calm waters. Behind it, they see the most beautiful rainbow. This is the new world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And again we hear Mozart's Adagio...
